caption:
This photograph features a body of water in the foreground with gentle ripples making patterns on the surface. Prominently, there is a single crumpled soda can floating in the water, indicating human presence and possible pollution. This object stands out against the dark blue hue of the water.

In the background, there is a large industrial or commercial building that spans the width of the photo. This building is two-storied, predominantly white with a flat roof, and has several windows and possible loading bays. The architecture is relatively plain and functional.

The sky is clear with just a few wispy clouds, suggesting a fair weather condition. The overall lighting of the scene indicates it could be either morning or afternoon. The combination of the industrial backdrop and the discarded can gives the photo a slight environmental commentary, possibly highlighting issues of industrial pollution or encroachment into natural water bodies.
title: Beer can floating on Duwamish River
